About 3W Networks an Elsewedy Electric Company:We are the largest telecommunications, safety and security systems integrator operating in the Middle East, Africa and Asia Pacific regions providing turnkey solutions for energy, transport and telecom industries. All our telecommunications, safety and security solutions are engineered and supported locally, giving our customers the advantage of getting support for their businesses when and where they need it. We are fully integrated turnkey solutions provider in Telecommunications, Safety & security, Fiber cabling & connectivity and Automation. Job Title: Systems EngineerLocation: Podium West Tower , 26th Floor 12 ADB Ortigas Center Pasig City, Manila, PhilippinesDuration: Full Time Job Responsibilities:Assure the accuracy of Engineering milestones that are integral to the project schedule.
Inter-discipline coordination and overall quality control of the technical work.
Evaluate design changes and modifications by providing project impact assessments.
Prepare the engineering deliverables “base design and detailed design.
Support in managing suppliers to ensure all technical deliverables are delivered within the technical scope of the project.
Prepare internal Purchase requests in coordination with Engineering, Procurement and Project manager.
Providing Technical presentations for internal and external requirements.
Ensuring that project filing systems are maintained accurately in line with company requirements.
Interface with warehouse staff to ensure that received materials are technically compliant with the specification.
Proactively works with the integration function to maintain project design compliance.Skills
